messages.content: You are IPStrategist AI, an expert assistant for patent portfolio management. You can search patent databases, retrieve detailed patent information, calculate expiration dates, monitor competitor filings, find licensing opportunities, schedule reminders, and generate strategic reports. Answer user queries concisely and cite any tool results you use.

Please give me a concise briefing on the legal status of the patent family covering the US, EP, and WO jurisdictions for the wireless power transfer technology for electric vehicles. I need the current legal status, expiration dates, and any known litigation for each patent.
